item.title: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Berdychi, Umanske, Netaylove, Nevelske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conduc... (LiveUAMap)

Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Novobakhmutivka, Oleksandropil, Orlivka, Umanske, Yasnobrodivka, Karlivka, Ocheretyne of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
